title: Update product showcase catalog for cart

requirements.text: Update the product showcase/catalog to include the following products: cable marking stickers, XLR cables, and used musical instruments.

quotes: the products are cable marking stickers, xlc cables used musical instrument,

acceptanceCriteria: The product list displayed on the site includes items named "Cable marking stickers", "XLR cables", and "Used musical instruments" (spelling corrected to XLR).
Each of the three products is visible in the product showcase UI without layout regressions on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Ensure the existing Add to Cart flow works for the newly listed products, including handling missing product prices gracefully if prices are not configured.

quotes: the products are cable marking stickers, xlc cables used musical instrument,

acceptanceCriteria: Visitors can add and remove each of the three new products to/from the cart using the existing cart UI.
If a product has no configured price, the UI clearly indicates that the price is unavailable (English text) and the cart does not break (no NaN/undefined totals or crashes).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding external databases or third-party commerce integrations.
Building inventory management or admin product management UI.
